code: import React,{useState}from'react';import MediasService from'./MediaService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MediaAdder(){const[media,setMedia]=useState({name:'',description:'',genre:'',rating:1,type:'DVD',duration:0,stock:0});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setMedia(prev=>({...prev,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();MediasService.create(media).then(()=>alert('Media added successfully')).catch(error=>console.error(error));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"name",placeholder:"Name",maxLength:"15",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"description",placeholder:"Description",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"genre",placeholder:"Genre",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"rating",type:"number",placeholder:"Rating (1-10)",min:"1",max:"10",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{name:"type",required:true,onChange:handleChange,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"DVD",children:"DVD"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"VHS",children:"VHS"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"BluRay",children:"BluRay"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"CD",children:"CD"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Vinyl",children:"Vinyl"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Cassette",children:"Cassette"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Digital",children:"Digital"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Other",children:"Other"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"duration",type:"number",placeholder:"Duration (minutes)",min:"0",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"stock",type:"number",placeholder:"Stock (0-100)",min:"0",max:"100",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Media"})]});}export default MediaAdder;
